snippet: While some airports and mass transit options in the New York City area returned quickly, some cars were still stranded on Long Island.
abstract: Officials across the Northeast warn that effects of weekend blizzard could upend transportation in some areas for days; some airports and mass transit options in the New York City area return quickly, but cars remain stranded on Long Island roadways.
lead_paragraph: While some airports and mass transit options in the New York City area returned quickly, some cars were still stranded on Long Island.

headline.main: Recovering Unevenly as Region Looks Ahead
headline.print_headline: Recovering Unevenly As Region Looks Ahead
